mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QnA(writeNo, user_id, title, content,createdDate,status) VALUES (seq_QnA.nextval,#{user_id},#{title},#{content},sysdate,#{status})
INSERT INTO QnA(writeNo, owner_id, title, content,createdDate,status) VALUES (seq_QnA.nextval,#{owner_id},#{title},#{content},sysdate,#{status})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum r, f.* FROM (SELECT * FROM QnA WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY writeNo DESC) f) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum r, f.* FROM (SELECT * FROM QnA WHERE owner_id = #{owner_id} ORDER BY writeNo DESC) f) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum r ,f.* FROM (SELECT * FROM QnA ORDER BY writeNo DESC) f) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum r ,f.* FROM (SELECT * FROM QnA WHERE user_id is not null ORDER BY writeNo DESC) f) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum r ,f.* FROM (SELECT * FROM QnA WHERE owner_id is not null ORDER BY writeNo DESC) f) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT count(*) FROM QnA WHERE user_id is not null
SELECT count(*) FROM QnA WHERE owner_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM QnA WHERE user_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM QnA WHERE owner_id IS NOT NULL
